General.Name: Fujian Yongfu Power Engineering Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Fujian Yongfu Power Engineering Co., Ltd. provides survey and design, planning and consulting, and general contracting business in the field of power generation in China and internationally. The company's services include power planning consulting, survey and design, EPC general contract, power energy investment, smart energy, and intelligent operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

6.Name: Ms. Yiqun  Wu
6.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
